body.name: COOAU 2.5K Dual Dash Cam, Built-in GPS Wi-Fi, 1440P Dash Cam Front and Inside with Infrared Night Vision, Dash Camera for Cars with Parking Mode, Loop Recording (D20S)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 14 mins
features: ✅【2.5K+1080P Dual Dash Cam】This dash camera for cars is your superior choice for Uber, Taxi, Lyft, Cab, Ride share, and must-has for family road trip! Dual dash cam front and inside, capture every details of the road front (170°, 2560*1440P) and passenger compartment (150°, 1920x1080P), which enables clear license plates, road signs and provides a super high-quality videos/images and powerful evidence in case of an accident.

✅【Looping Recording & Built-in GPS Dash Car Camera】COOAU D20S dash cam with GPS can display the speed and location of vehicle, you can view your driving route in Google Maps of the APP. This is a great option for Uber drivers because they can use it to prove themselves if they are convicted of a speeding violation or get into a traffic accident. The car dash cam front (2.5K) and inside(1080P) seamless loop recording overwrites the oldest footage with the newest upon filling a card to capacity.

✅【Infrared Night Vision Interior Car Camera】The internal camera features 4 IR LEDs and an F2.0 aperture to handle low-light conditions and ensure perfect video footage even when the cabin is dark. Uber drivers will no longer be bothered by difficult passengers at any time with this dash cam. The front dash camera and unique WDR video system automatically balances the light and dark areas of the video, allowing the front-facing camera to record rich colors and clear road content even at night.

✅【Smart APP+ Shortcut Keys】D20S dash cam with wifi connects to the APP, you can view or share videos directly in the APP without a computer, you can also modify the camera settings through the APP. There are four shortcut keys on the bottom of the car camera, which make it easier to adjust the system settings of the recorder. D20S dash camera has upgraded recording shortcuts to set whether you want to record the sound of the car for your next video. It is easy to use, even for new users.

✅【Upgraded Parking Mode】COOAU dash cam with parking mode, when a collision is detected, the car dash cam will automatically turn on and record everything that happens, when you start the car again, the dash cam will make a sound to remind you that parking monitoring has been triggered, so you won't miss any event that has suspicious behavior to your car, D20S dash camera distinguishes between parking and driving mode after the upgrade to avoid being misjudged during driving.

✅【Multi-function Car Dash Camera】The dash camera for cars has added a lock screen function. Auto LCD off timer ensures you won't be disturbed by another glowing rectangle on the car, and a flashing indicator light alerts you if the camera is recording normally, greatly reducing the impact of nighttime driving. Built-in super capacitors ensure stable camera operation in most climates: -4° to 158 °F (-20°C to 70 °C).

✅【Professional and Efficient After-sales Team】COOAU dash cam provides 24 months warranty and prompt response within 24 hours, you can solve your problem though us in the fastest way, and we will extend the warranty for you. Perfect dual dash camera for Uber, taxi, shared cars, Lyft, home and business people.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ensure your driving safety and capture life's moments.

Looking for a reliable dash cam to capture your journeys? Capture every detail of your drive with the D20S dash cam! Its 4MP resolution, F1.8 aperture, 6 glass lenses, and Novatek NT96565 High Performance CPU ensure stunningly clear footage. It captures clear images of road signs and license plates, making it a reliable witness to any incidents.

Attention, Uber drivers and driving instructors! The D20S dual dash cam provides all-round protection with a 170° front camera and 150° interior camera. Perfect for ride-share drivers, driving instructors, or anyone who wants to monitor passengers or review driving maneuvers. The footage can also serve as evidence in case of an accident.
WDR and EV Adjustment The D20S car dash cam enhances your driving experience with WDR technology for clear images in any lighting. It also has EV adjustment for personalized exposure.

Protect Your Car at All Times Previous page Next page To achieve parking monitor and motion detection, please connecting the camera to the car battery using the [ACC BATT GND] hardwire kit. (Hardwire kit not included)

GPS Tracker D20S dash cam with GPS provides real-time location updates, so you can protect your innocence by providing evidence of your whereabouts through speed and trajectory tracking. Whether you're wrongly accused of a traffic violation or involved in an accident. Wi-Fi Connection & Free APP This user-friendly app provides access to your dash cam footage, making it easier to browse recorded videos or photos. Thanks to its intuitive design, the app is easy to navigate and use. Please note that the D20S app runs on a 2.4GB WiFi hotspot and may not be suitable for remote connections.

Loop Recording Loop recording ensures seamless footage and automatically overwrites old files with new recordings, eliminating the need for manual deletion. Perfect for long trips or continuous coverage while driving. Max Support 256 GB SD Card (SD Card NOT included) To ensure the best performance, use a Class 10, U3 speed SD card, ideally from Samsung. Avoid generic cards like “SanDisk Ultra” as they are not designed for high-end dash cams. Remember to format any new memory card using the app or the camera before use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent dash camera
reviews.reviewText: The camera is easy to setup and install. I used a wiring kit to hardwire the camera so I could take advantage of all the features of the camera. The picture quality is excellent and very simple to download. You can’t find a better dash cam for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will definitely recommend this dash cam.
reviews.reviewText: I bought the COOAU D20S dash cam for my new car to replace the Veckle mini 0906 I had in the old car. I am very happy with my new COOAU D20S, there are a number of features that the previous one did not have; First of all, it has wifi, I can connect the camera to my Android phone with an application that is offered with the camera to view or download the videos on my phone, although I am not completely familiar with the app yet, I notice that at the same time I watch the video on my phone, a map shows me the location and route of the video which is very helpful.On the front, it has a 170-degree front view camera with 1440P resolution that captures everything in detail. The rear camera facing the inside of the car (I think it has 150 degrees of rear view), gives me a great view of the inside and rear outside of the car, and has built-in infrared lights for nighttime use, but I noticed that even without the infrared lights, I still get videos with great detail.I have the camera connected with the supplied cable to the cigarette lighter, when I turn off my car, (Nissan Kicks), after 4 or 5 minutes, the camera disconnects, exactly what I want. I just want to mention that because the cable is not too thick, it is easy to conceal.There's nothing I don't like about the camera, I even used the suction mount cup to attach it to the windshield to hold it up temporarily and then use the adhesive bracket, but to my surprise, it's still held very securely.I know the camera and the app has many other features that I haven't explored yet, so I cannot comment on it; I will get there.I found the price reasonable for what I bought and I will definitely recommend this camera to you if you are thinking of purchasing one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: COOAU 2.5K Dual Dash CamPicture and camera quality is excellent. Easily installed in two SUVs that I own. Would recommend this product for quality and security. Trying to connect dash cam to iphone but experiencing difficulty which may be due to VPN. Recommend a video for users to navigate the ficam app and clarify in the manual how to use the buttons on the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Remarkably good performance
reviews.reviewText: Excellent unit. Instructions are detailed and overall well written but there are many gaps that can cause confusion. A few improvements are needed. I am still in the process of reviewing these however some are below.The instructions on how to navigate the app should be clearer: For example, how do you get to the “Emergency" files - those that indicate that your vehicle was in an accident or hit while parked and unattended! Through the app or through the unit itself - or both? Not too clear.It should have been stated on the FIRST page that the app necessary to be downloaded is FICAM. This information is not found until the END of the manual on page 34 - in parentheses!! (The manual is 37 pages.) A separate black “Tips” card is included in the box, which mentions the app but it doesn’t give the NAME of the app! It should also be made clear the the unit can be controlled entirely from the app itself. In fact, the unit can ONLY be controlled by the app WHILE it is connected to at the app. The cam cannot be controlled manually and will alert you of this. If the app is downloaded right away, the entire setup can be done from your phone. This makes life MUCH easier (especially if you have big hands!)I also think the COOAU could include an electrostatic mounting film for the adhesive mount. This would make it much easier to remove from the glass when or if the vehicle is sold or turned in from lease.A minor detail: A micro disc is needed for this camera. It is NOT included. It MUST be formatted before installation. (The manual states this.) If the purchaser does not have a card reader, it must be purchased beforehand in order to format the card. Not a big expense - around $15 - but this information should be provided.The manual could be clearer but the dash cam itself is excellent. Took off one star for the lack of clarity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: I'm very satisfied with my purchase. The dash cam has a really good design and form factor. It's small and sleek enough to not obstruct your view out of the windshield while still having a viewable monitor.Picture quality is great and has all the features that you'd want. This a high quality dash cam that is equal to other dash cams that cost much more.One more thing: the suction cup mount is really solid. I've had other dash cams that I used with suction cup mounts but it was flimsy. The Cooau mount is very well designed and has very strong suction.

reviews.reviewTitle: コンパクトで使いやすくコスパ最高！！
reviews.reviewText: 以前使用していた、ドライブレコーダーが大きく吸盤が何回も外れたので新しくこちらを購入しました！コンパクトで使いやすく、画質もいいです！あとUSBタイプになっているので、シガーソケットに差さなくても大丈夫な所がいいです！値段も安くいい買い物ができました！

スバル XV 用にこのダイバーレコーダーを購入しました。このドライブレコーダーを選んだ理由：1)サイズがコンパクトだったこと。2)バックカメラケーブルは必要ありませんでした。3)マイクロUSBから給電できます。4) Wi-Fiに接続してスマートフォンで画像を確認することも可能です。 SD カードの容量を節約し、動作を高速化するために、ビデオ解像度を 1080p に設定しました。固定軸ジョイントではなくボールジョイントを使用した方が良いでしょう。総合的に見てコストパフォーマンスの高いドライブレコーダーです。 ACCケーブルを取り付けて駐車監視モードを使うのが楽しみです。
良い商品です！コンパクトで操作も簡単でした！僕は軽トラが自家用車なのですが、２個目購入しました!後方用に！買って良かったです。

reviews.reviewTitle: スタイリッシュで高性能、コスパ良し
reviews.reviewText: デザインが気に入り購入しました。GPS搭載で前後カメラでスマホ連携ができて1万円程度だったのでとてもお買い得でした。基本機能である録画の画質もじゅんぶんに良いです。液晶は小さいですが、スマホから設定とか録画の確認とかできるので問題はないです。wifiでスマホと繋いで操作ができるのがすごく良いですね。そのまま画像のダウンロードもできますし。全体的には大満足ですが、マイナス点も。取り付け位置ですが、運転席側に取り付けると邪魔なので、助手席側に付けると思うのですよね。そうすると、カメラの位置が右左逆の方が有り難いですね。助手席の端の方に取り付けると、雨の日にワイパーが届かない場所にカメラが来てしまい、撮影映像が微妙になってしまいます。リアカメラ側も設置場所によってはルームミラーと重なるので結構設置場所を選びます。色々悩んだ末にダッシュボード真ん中に設置しました。問題はブラケットで、本体上側にしか取り付けられなくて、逆向きに設置できないこともないのですが、記録される映像が逆さまになるんですよね。上下反転の設定があれば完璧だったんですけどね。仕方ないのでスマホホルダーを改造して取り付けました。後方カメラの映りを考えると、設置場所が結構悩まされますね。上下反転で設置できる仕組みとか、本体下側にカメラマウント用のネジでも切ってあるとかなり良い商品になると思います。

reviews.reviewTitle: スマホとWiFi接続はできません。
reviews.reviewText: 商品のスマホ版のページの一部にWiFi接続できるという画像での紹介が載せられていましたが、WiFi接続機能はありませんでしたので、返品させて頂きました。PC版の方には掲載がなかったということでした。その点以外は電源ケーブルの電源側端子がシガーソケットプラグではなく、USBであることなど、工夫されている製品だと感じました。この件に関して出品者様＆メーカー様と何度かやり取りしました。中国企業の方のようで、メールの文面は過剰な丁寧語など少し変なところは有りましたが、この件に関して真摯に迅速にご対応頂けました。お詫びにとamazonギフトカードまで下さいました。
